ref: 6706 dhaṭa1 m. ʻ scale of a balance, a balance ʼ Mit. 2. dhaṭaka -- m. ʻ a partic. weight = 42 raktikā ʼ, ˚ṭikā<-> f. Līl. (ʻ 5 ser ʼ Apte). [MIA. < dhr̥tá -- (with or sc. tulayā) ʻ measured, weighed ʼ MBh. -- √dhr̥]
K. dar m. ʻ large fixed scales for heavy loads, calculation of the weight of a load ʼ;
Ku. dhaṛ ʻ weighing of one's body against grain to be given in alms ʼ.
